name: graupel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
snowflakes covered with ice, or one of these snowflakes: The small, soft pellets of hail are sometimes called graupel by professionals. Smaller graupels are generally referred to as snow grains.
naumoid/iStock/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examples70% of the rain water came from the melting of graupel and hail.If the graupel layer was an inch or more, the snow from this storm would likely be avalanche. A graupel or a frozen raindrop may become the initial stage of a much faster growth.
